citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Protocol #2024-47 did not have an adequate alternative search for painful procedures. The written narrative of the
methods and sources used to determine that alternatives were not available did not include the splenectomy procedure
described in the protocol. Not including painful procedures in the narrative prevents the IACUC from ensuring that the
principal investigator has considered alternatives to all procedures that may cause more than momentary or slight pain or
distress.
The IACUC shall determine that the principal investigator has considered alternatives to procedures that may cause more
than momentary or slight pain or distress to the animals and has provided a written narrative description of the methods
and sources used to determine that alternatives were not available.
Correct by August 15, 2025
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with facility staff.
